title: Cry Zombie Cry
description: With the Guignol Gang fully armed and prepared to defend the castle, Bethany and company are off to see the Wizard of Odd.The long-awaited entry to the I Zombie series has arrived.And it's ready to rock.Bethany Nitshimi is back and ready to crush the Zero Day Collective with a wall of sound. Together with the metal band Unsun, Bethany will have the undead horde banging their heads until brain runs thick in the streets.If it's too loud, you're too old...or dead.
author: Jack Wallen
